snippet: Christine C. Quinn faces conflicting pressures from labor allies and the business community on a proposal that would require employers who benefit from city subsidies to pay workers more.
lead_paragraph: Christine C. Quinn faces conflicting pressures from labor allies and the business community on a proposal that would require employers who benefit from city subsidies to pay workers more.

headline.main: Council Speaker, Pulled 2 Ways on Wage Bill, Delays Taking a Stand
headline.print_headline: Quinn, Pulled 2 Ways on Wage Bill, Delays Taking a Stand
headline.seo: Council Speaker, Christine Quinn, Delays Taking Stand on Wage Bill
